p: Female BALB/c mice, 4–6 weeks old, were purchased from Instituto de Ciência e Tecnologia em Biomodelos of Fundação Oswaldo Cruz, Rio de Janeiro, and maintained in accordance with National Council for Control of Animal Experimentation (Conselho Nacional de Controle de Experimentação Animal–CONCEA). The local Ethics Committee on Animal Care and Utilization approved all procedures involving the animals (CEUA/IOC – L053/2016).
